abstract: The initiative would let people to do things like check their stock prices or peruse their photos all while watching TV.
snippet: The initiative would let people to do things like check their stock prices or peruse their photos all while watching TV.
lead_paragraph: “Hoping to plant their flags on the screens of Internet-connected television sets, Intel Corp. and Yahoo Inc. unveiled a new project Wednesday to populate those screens with tiny programs called widgets,” the Associated Press reports.

headline.main: Intel, Yahoo Partnering on Internet TV Concept
